text.title: County Fermanagh

p.s:

Irish

Contae Fhear Manach
) is a largely rural county in the south-west of
Northern Ireland
and is famed for its numerous lakes .
County Fermanagh belongs to the province of Ulster and is one of the six counties that form Northern Ireland .
It is Northern Ireland ’s western most county and covers an area of 1,691 km ² .

Its capital ( County Town ) is
Enniskillen
housing the tourist attractions of Enniskillen Castle , Cole 's Monument , the Ardhowen Theatre and Saint Macartin 's Cathedral .
County Fermanagh is a rural area and therefore agriculture and tourism are the most important industries .
The agricultural land is mainly used for hay and grazing than for other crops .
The two lakes Upper Lough Erne and Lower Lough Erne are separated by the county 's capital and linked to the river Shannon .

p.s: There are three main airports in Northern Ireland .
Both ( BFS ) and ( BHD ) are a 2 hour drive away .
Alternatively ( DUB ) is about 2.5h drive from Fermanagh and many like to combine seeing both the beauty and culture of both Southern as well as Northern Ireland .
Many travellers from the UK like to avail of the frequent ferry services operating between Britain and Northern Ireland .

p.s: Most retailers and establishments will display if they accept Euro or not , but it is advisable to have your money changed to the local currency .
You would look at spending about £5-7 on " pub grub " for lunch in a bar .
Budget for about £20 for a main course meal in a mid price restaurant in the evenings .
There are a number of high quality B&Bs/family run guesthouses in Fermanagh to select from .
Expect to pay around £20-30 per person on average .
With over 58 properties on offer this is the preferred method of accommodation for most visiting Fermanagh looking for value .
For those on a budget , hostels are a cheaper option but have less coverage than B&Bs .
There are only 4 hostels - The Bridges Youth Hostel , Lough Melvin Holiday Centre , Tir Navar and Share Centre .
There are only about 11 hotels operating in Fermanagh , ranging from 2 to 4 star
For groups and larger families there are over 180 self-catering choices on offer so you will be spoilt for choice .
You be surprised to hear that Fermanagh has the second lowest crime rate in Europe .
Even during the height of the " troubles " and civil rights movement Fermanagh tourist attractions were hardly affected .
The unrest of the 70s and 80s have become a thing of the past in recent years .
